examples.example: 只要我们坚持不懈地努力，就一定能实现自己的梦想。

translate.english: As long as we persevere in our efforts, we will definitely be able to realize our dreams.

examples.example: 只要我们勇敢地去追求，就一定能实现心中的美好愿望。

translate.english: As long as we bravely pursue, we will definitely be able to realize the beautiful wishes in our hearts.

examples.example: 只要我们脚踏实地去奋斗，就一定能实现人生的目标。

translate.english: As long as we strive down-to-earth, we will definitely be able to achieve the goals of life.
